markdownRemark.excerpt: This is gatsby, a react-based framework for making static websites. Seems like a bit of a contradiction, seeing as react is supposed to be all about dynamic…
markdownRemark.html: This is gatsby, a react-based framework for making static websites. Seems like a bit of a contradiction, seeing as react is supposed to be all about dynamic websites, but what gatsby offers instead is speed. Everything’s rendered at compile time, and every link on a page is prefetched.

frontmatter.title: Gatsby
frontmatter.description: This is Gatsby, a react-based framework for creating static sites
